name: MAQ!
description: MAQ! is our final year project from University. While rough around the edges we're very proud of it. Premise is simple, you create animals in up to 4-player local co-op and race them on various planets. We had to develop with various restraints. For example we could only use colours from 2 colour gradients. The game supports Xbox 360 controllers for playing past 1 player and updates its planets information directly from Nasa's Exoplanet archive.
